messages.content:
📅 Add Events from the GenAI Global Community to Your Google Calendar 
Never miss a session again—stay in sync with everything happening in the GenAI community!

To add upcoming events directly to your Google Calendar, just follow this step-by-step guide:
👉 [How to Sync Events with Google Calendar & Timezone Mgmt](https://sync-google-calendar-wit-erprmym.gamma.site/)

Once added, the MIT GenAI calendar will appear under "My Calendars" in your Google Calendar sidebar. From there, you can toggle it on or off anytime.

Stay updated, stay connected!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

🎯onboarding Part 2: 🤝 Join a Buddy Group:

Navigate to the <#1353443209166065664>  channel and carefully provide the following information for accurate buddy pairing:

🌎 Time Zone: (e.g., PST, EST, CET)
📝 Preferred Display Name: (How you’d like others to address you)
🎯 Your Main Goal for the Server: (Networking, Learning, Collaboration, etc.)
🏭 Industry or Sector: Your field (e.g., finance, healthcare) for context fit
💡 Areas of Expertise: Your top skills to offer for complementary matches
🎯 Desired Learning Topics: What you want to learn to align goals
💬 Communication & Interaction Preferences: Preferred format & cadence (e.g., weekly calls, async chat)

IMPORTANT: Slow mode ⏳ is enabled (30-minute cooldown between messages) to ensure clarity and accuracy. Please double-check your message before sending!

For every new cohort, we collect this information during the first two days after general admissions. After this period, we utilize AI to pair you into optimal buddy groups for effective collaboration and community engagement!

ANY QUESTIONS regarding the buddy group process head to <#1363539367058084062> channel !

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

🎯onboarding Part 3: 👋 Introduce Yourself:

Head to the <#1353442520717066320>  channel and create your introduction using the following template:

📌 Full Name: (e.g., John Doe)

📚 Background: (Your professional or academic background)

💼 Role: (Your current professional role or focus)

📍 Location: (Your current city or region)

🔗 LinkedIn: (URL to your LinkedIn profile)

🎨 Hobbies: (Interests such as art, design, travel, languages, etc.)

Make sure your Name/Nickname on the server is your full name as well !

Let's dive in and start your exciting journey today! 🚀 If you need assistance, our moderators are ready to help.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 


🎯onboarding Optional Step: Showcase Your Gen AI Global Role on LinkedIn!

You've earned your official title with Gen AI Global—now let's highlight it professionally on LinkedIn, aligned with MIT Professional Education guidelines. 

Here's how:

Step-by-Step:

[1] Your Title: General Member {Community}

[2] Update Your LinkedIn:

[A] Go to your Profile → Click "Add profile section" → Choose "Add Experience".

[B] Title: Paste your selected title from above.

[C] Type: Select "Volunteer" (important for compliance!) 

[D] Company: Type "Gen AI Global" and select our official page (look for the 🔴🟠 logo).

[3] Description (Optional but recommended):

As a Network Member of the Global Gen AI Professional Network—an MIT Professional Education–backed community that unites AI practitioners, business leaders, and technologists in 30 + countries—I contribute to daily, real‑time conversations on generative‑AI breakthroughs, ethics, and cross‑industry applications. By sharing resources, spotlighting peer insights, and voting on weekly Q&A topics, I help surface practitioner‑tested best practices and shape how organizations translate frontier research into responsible, high‑impact solutions. Our mission is to democratize cutting‑edge knowledge, accelerate ethical adoption, and cultivate a trusted global talent pool capable of leading the next wave of AI‑driven transformation—and my voice is part of that momentum. {Example}

⚠️ Important: Clearly mark your role as "Volunteer" to comply with MIT PE community guidelines and avoid any legal issues. {in description}

If you have questions, feel free to reach out!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

📝 We would like to ensure everyone can easily identify each other. For this, using your full name on this Discord server is important. How do you set your server nickname to Your Full Name? Right-clicking your name, go to Profile, Editing your Profile, and then Editing your Per-server Profile. Then, enter your full name in the Server Nickname prompt. We appreciate it!
